content: S-SD-S Insulated VDE screwdriver set (Slim) Slimline VDE-approved insulated hand screwdriver set with 11 interchangeable extra- slim blades, two handles and durable pouch ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Bits and sockets- ### FEATURES:Features VDE approved and IEC 60900 tested – insulated screwdriver with tested electrical resistance up to 10,000 volts for safer work up to the permissible voltage of 1000 volts Includes two comfortable and practical handles – contoured for a more comfortable grip during long days of use, with anti-roll-away profile and auto-lock chuck Easier access to narrow spaces – extra-slim screwdriver blades to reach screws in tight spots. Interchangeable blades with PZ/S (1/2), Slotted SL (0.6x3.5, 1x5.5), PH (1,2), PZ (1,2), TX (15/20/25) recess types Compact storage pouch with hanging loop for wall mount – durable, folding case helps you keep the set organized and protected during transportation and usage. Belt loop allows easy access on the go Applications Setting all screws commonly used in the electrical trade (set includes 11 interchangeable blades) Setting sunken screws and spring elements – 154 mm long blades with extra-slim shank Protective, VDE-approved insulated screwdriver blades for use by electricians Setting sunken screws and spring elements – 6 long blades with extra-slim shank ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 2340564 - Hand screwdriver S-SD-S VDE Slim QC(13) - Package Size 1 pc
